title: History of Australian surfing
creator_credit: Nat Young, Grant Young and Nat Young Holdings
brief_description: This program reminisces over the colourful sixties, when surfing was the latest fashion - bikinis, okanuis, malibus, the Delltones, Little Patty, the stomp! Performances from many of Australia’s surfing champions are presented, including Wayne Lynch, Michael Patterson, Peter Townsend, Mark Warren, Mark Richards, Simon Anderson and Rabbit Bartholomew.
